StoreManagementSystem

Class Staff

  • Object
    • Person
      • Staff

  • public class Staff
extends Person
    Contains details about staff. Each member of staff has a level of access granted to them, which determines the features they can use in the driver class. This is set in the constructor, along with their name and ID. There is no public method to return the password. Instead, there is a boolean method to validate the password.

      • passwordValidation

        public boolean passwordValidation(char[] charArr)
        Validates a char array to check if it matches the password. If it does, it returns the boolean 'login' as true. 'login' is initially set to false in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        charArr - The password required for the staff member to log in
        Returns:
        login

      • setAccessLevel

        public void setAccessLevel(int accessLevel)
        Sets the access level for the staff member
        Parameters:
        accessLevel - Determines authorization level

      • setPassword

        Sets the password for the staff member
        Parameters:

      • setRole

        role - Determines staff role
